mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_set_account_dtl ( flow_dtl_no, store_id, account_type, flow_no, biz_type, order_date, fun_code, amount, cur_balance, fund_direction ) VALUES
( #{item.flowDtlNo}, #{item.storeId}, #{item.accountType}, #{item.flowNo}, #{item.bizType}, #{item.orderDate}, #{item.funCode}, #{item.amount}, #{item.curBalance}, #{item.fundDirection} )
